title: Social Problem-solving Course Based on the GENICS Learning Model for Enhancing Creative Thinking and Metaskills

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to analyze basic social issues and experience with digital device utilization
context.additional_context: Targeting Job Seekers and Professionals Aiming to Strengthen Social Sector Practical Competencies. Focuses on Project-Based Learning Through Real-World Case Studies

learning_goals: Enhance the ability to analyze social issues from multiple perspectives by applying the six stages of the GENICS learning model
Improve creative thinking indicators (fluency, flexibility, originality, elaboration) by at least 30%
Achieve at least 80% proficiency in applying metaskills (self-management, social intelligence, creative thinking strategies) in project evaluations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
